import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { USER_MAIN_DATA } from '../../data/mocked-data' import { Modelisation } from '../../data/Modelisation' //IMPORT ASSETS import caloriesImg from '../../assets/calories-icon.png' import proteinesImg from '../../assets/protein-icon.png' import glucidesImg from '../../assets/carbs-icon.png' import lipidesImg from '../../assets/fat-icon.png' import './style.scss' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Energie = () => { const [data, setData] = useState(null) const paramsId = useParams() const calories = 'calories' const proteines = 'protéines' const glucides = 'glucides' const lipides = 'lipides' useEffect(() => { const modelisation = new Modelisation(USER_MAIN_DATA) setData(modelisation.formatDataEnergy(paramsId)) }, []) // const capitalize = (word) => { // return word[0].toUpperCase() + word.substring(1) // } return (

{`${data.calorieCount}kCal`}

{calories}

{`${data.proteinCount}g`}

{'Protéines'}

{`${data.carbohydrateCount}g`}

{'Glucides'}

 ) } export default Energie
